alert.note: Alert for Racine (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 4:40PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Racine County through 515 PM CDT... At 440 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sturtevant, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Racine, Mount Pleasant, Sturtevant, Union Grove, Yorkville, Wind Point, Elmwood Park, North Bay, and Franksville. This includes Interstate 41/94 between mile markers 330 and 337. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
